nodes.text: Commissar was a position of authority on the planet Grizmallt.

Following the First Battle of Geonosis, during which the Acclamator-class assault ship, a product of Rothana Heavy Engineering, itself a subsidiary to Kuat Drive Yards, was introduced, the Commissars of the planet Grizmallt ordered their industrial spies and starship designers to reduce Kuat's lead for new contracts handed out by the Galactic Republic.
